definition.text: This indicator produces the MACD R2 buy and sell signals

paragraphs.text: The MACD R2, or refinement 2, further recduces false signals by doing the the following:
Wait for three (3) periods after the crossover to take a position, if during that period another crossover happens then it waits for another crossover
Checks the difference between the MACD line and the Signal, if the difference is larger than predetermined value (standard set to 2%) then it indicates a buy signal
The opposite is true for the sell indications, it is of course possible to alter these settings in the data mine. The underlying calculations uses the standard MACD settings, 12-26-9
